price: 48. Sima bobwakela ye mayi ya moto na motu naye, lokola etumbu makasi.
arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّواْ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣubbū fawqa rasihi min ʿadhābi al-ḥamīmi
